title.narrative: Bihar State Highways II Project (formerly Bihar State Roads II)

description.narrative: The Bihar State Highways II Project will build and upgrade about 389 kilometers (km) of state highways identified under the State Highway Development Program in Bihar. It will involve upgrading roads to two lanes, strengthening culverts and bridges, building new road sections and bridges and cross drainage structures, and building structures for resettlement and rehabilitation. Consulting support will be provided to support implementation of civil works.

participating-org.narrative: Bihar State Road Development Corporation Ltd.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Increased transport efficiency and safety on project roads

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Vehicle travel time on the project roads is reduced because of the improved condition of the roads; travel speed increases to an average of 40 km/h for cars (2009 baseline: 15-25 km/h).

description.narrative: Increased transport efficiency and safety on project roads

title.narrative: Road signage meets the requirements of the road safety audit upon project completion (2009 baseline: road signage is basic).

description.narrative: Increased transport efficiency and safety on project roads
